member.name: SpatialAudioMetadataWriterOverflowMode
member.summary: Specifies the desired behavior when an attempts to write more items into the metadata buffer than was specified when the client was initialized.

member.name: SpatialAudioMetadataWriterOverflowMode.SpatialAudioMetadataWriterOverflow_MergeWithNew
member.summary: The write operation will succeed, the overflow item will be merged with previous item and adopt the frame offset of newest item.

member.name: SpatialAudioMetadataWriterOverflowMode.SpatialAudioMetadataWriterOverflow_MergeWithLast
member.summary: The write operation will succeed, the overflow item will be merged with previous item and keep the existing frame offset.
